column4: anyone using an audigy 2zs on edgy? isn't the sound a little too low?
anyone using an audigy 2zs on edgy? isn't the sound a little too low?
why not make your volume louder with sudo alsamixer
i tried that it's up to the max and it's lower than what it is in windows
cranking master and pcm is about half as loud as it would be in windows on full
that package isn't available for edgy?
feisty has jre-1.5.0-10-1
it might be in the backports
i tried linking the java plugin in the firefox folder and firefox crashes when visiting a java enabled website. i'm using 1.5 update 10
I don't even see 1.6 as being out
hmm odd some bloke on the forums said it was out
blah nvm
on the java site they only have java 5.0 update 10 which is 1.5.0 update 10
actually it is out
i see it on java.sun.com
ht he SDK has it but not the runtime environment
runtime is there
and I see why also it's java EE
http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp the runtime environment is listed on there
yeah it's the JDK that's why I didn't notice I was looking at the runtime environment alone
think they just updated their page when I was looking at it also
